languages.text: "Нет, отче. Это богохульный текст, сотворенный умом еретика и безбожника, предавшего свой род. Врага Человечества надо знать в лицо".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, отче. Это богохульный текст, сотворенный умом еретика и безбожника, предавшего свой род. Врага Человечества надо знать в лицо".

languages.text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."
languages.original_text: "Нет, отче. Это богохульный текст, сотворенный умом еретика и безбожника, предавшего свой род. Врага Человечества надо знать в лицо".

traits.locale_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, a product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of their enemy."
"No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, a product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of their enemy."
"No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, a product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of their enemy."

"No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."
"No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

languages.text: 「いや、リバーエンド。それは不敬の文書、人類を裏切った異端者と背教者の思考の産物だ。まずは敵の実情を知らないとな」
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、リバーエンド。それは不敬の文書、人類を裏切った異端者と背教者の思考の産物だ。まずは敵の実情を知らないとな」

languages.text: « Non, révérend. C'est un texte blasphématoire, écrit par un hérétique doublé d'un apostat ayant trahi l'humanité. Il faut toujours apprendre à connaître son ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: « Non, révérend. C'est un texte blasphématoire, écrit par un hérétique doublé d'un apostat ayant trahi l'humanité. Il faut toujours apprendre à connaître son ennemi. »

languages.text: “不，牧师。这是一份亵渎神明的手稿，是叛教者、异端分子与人类叛徒的思想产物。我们应该了解敌人的真面目。”
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: “不，牧师。这是一份亵渎神明的手稿，是叛教者、异端分子与人类叛徒的思想产物。我们应该了解敌人的真面目。”

languages.text: "Nein, Reverend. Es ist ein blasphemischer Text, ein Produkt des Geistes eines Ketzers und Apostaten, der die Menschheit verraten hat. Man sollte stets das Gesicht seines Feindes kennen."
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Reverend. Es ist ein blasphemischer Text, ein Produkt des Geistes eines Ketzers und Apostaten, der die Menschheit verraten hat. Man sollte stets das Gesicht seines Feindes kennen."

languages.text: «No, reverendo. Es un texto blasfemo, producto de la mente de un hereje y apóstata que traicionó a la Humanidad. Considero importante conocer al enemigo».
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: «No, reverendo. Es un texto blasfemo, producto de la mente de un hereje y apóstata que traicionó a la Humanidad. Considero importante conocer a nuestros enemigos».

languages.text: "Hayır Muhterem. Bu, İnsanlığa ihanet etmiş bir kâfirin ve müridin zihninden çıkma, din dışı bir metin. İnsan, düşmanının suretini tanımalıdır."
languages.original_text: "No, Reverend. It is a blasphemous text, the product of the mind of a heretic and an apostate who betrayed Humankind. One should know the face of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Muhterem. Bu, İnsanlığa ihanet etmiş bir kâfirin ve müridin zihninden çıkma, din dışı bir metin. Kişi düşmanının suretini tanımalıdır."
